thread.title: Hilton Shenzhen Futian opens

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Hilton Shenzhen Futian opens
text:
Hilton Worldwide and Hilton Hotels & Resorts today announced the opening of Hilton Shenzhen Futian. This hotel marks the second Hilton Hotels & Resorts property and the third Hilton Worldwide hotel in Shenzhen. 
Strategically situated in the heart of Shenzhen, the 23-story hotel features 320 guest-rooms and suites and is operated by Hilton Worldwide and owned by Great China International Group Co., Ltd. To date, Hilton Worldwide has over 60 operating hotels in Greater China. 
"China is one of the most important and fastest growing markets for Hilton Worldwide, and the opening of Hilton Shenzhen Futian is an important milestone for Hilton Worldwide. 
"Shenzhen is one of China's wealthiest cities, a bustling, modern metropolis that links Hong Kong to China's mainland and also a major transport hub for the region," said Rob Palleschi, global head, full service brands, Hilton Worldwide.
